{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=DSL-N13 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/02/2008 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=MSQDSLN13 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348S |cpu1_cspeed=240 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CTTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=ASUS WL-127n |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|802.11n All-in-1 Wireless ADSL2/2+ Home Gateway}}
[http://www.asus.com/Networks/ADSL_Modem_Routers/DSLN13/ Product page] "ASUS" and "DSL-N13 R1.41" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"WL-127n-RW R1.00", "ASUS", and a date code of '''0736''' (September 2007) is silkscreened on the back of the wireless module. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/dsl-n13 On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=439399 On the DD-WRT forums]
:[http://www.elitebastards.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=642&Itemid=27&limitstart=1 Review on Elite Bastards] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=24522 On the OpenWrt forums] There is a '''VIA''' VT6212L USB 2.0 controller on-board. The default SSID is, according the manual, '''Default''' (yes, there is a captial D). The power adapter shown in the FCC external photos is an '''Amigo''' AMS3-1201200FU (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.2A). ==Images== File:DSL-N13.jpg|angled
